title: OpenCare
text: OpenCare allows anyone to search for a care service and see how its quality compares with its peers across Scotland using public data from the Care Inspectorate. Just navigate to the Dashboard on the drop down menu in the sidebar of this page to begin.

title: OpenCare
text:
Notes
This dashboard was created using R, Quarto, Observable JavaScript and caffeine, inspired by a series by Melissa Van Bussel.






NoteDisclaimer



This dashboard is not affiliated with or supported by the Care Inspectorate. It contains public sector information licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.
